SEARCH
Module com.jkfd.oopii
Package com.jkfd.oopii.Subsystem

Class Subsystem

java.lang.Object
com.jkfd.oopii.Subsystem.Subsystem
Direct Known Subclasses:
BackupSubsystem, EventReminderSubsystem
public abstract class Subsystem extends Object
Base subsystem class all subsystems are built upon.

  • Field Details

    • logger

      protected final org.slf4j.Logger logger
      Logger instance of the subsystem.

    • name

      public String name
      The name of the subsystem.

    • suspended

      public boolean suspended
      Variable that is set if the subsystem is suspended. Suspended subsystems will not fire when their timer ticks.

    • fireTime

      public long fireTime
      The fireTime sets how often/quick the subsystem should be fired. Currently, the default is every 5 Minutes (300000 ms).

    • maxFailCount

      public int maxFailCount
      The amount of times a subsystem is allowed to error before getting suspended. Default: 5 times.

  • Constructor Details

    • Subsystem

      public Subsystem()

  • Method Details

    • Fire

      public void Fire()
      The fire function will be called every time the fire time has been reached. The default Fire() action is just logging that the subsystem has fired.

    • HandleException

      public void HandleException(Exception e)
      Exception handling. Subsystems should utilize "super.HandleException(exceptionVar);".
      Parameters:
      e - exception to handle

    • Shutdown

      public void Shutdown()
      This function will be called when the SubsystemManager is shutting down. Some subsystems might implement custom logic to clean up before fully shutting down. Subsystems should utilize "super.Shutdown();" when using custom shutdown logic.

    • SetTimer

      public void SetTimer(Timer timer)
      Sets the timer reference for the subsystem for later use (e.g.: shutdown operations).
      Parameters:
      timer - timer reference

    • GetTimer

      public Timer GetTimer()
      Returns the timer reference firing this subsystem.
      Returns:
      timer reference
